data.text: With the latest update, this app is horrible. It is nowhere near user-friendly anymore. The "File" tab is basically just a "Back" button now. It does not provide the traditional file options that every program in existence gives you. If you're paying to use an app, you should get ALL the same features of the PC version. If I knew any better, it's as if since it's a Microsoft product that it's a ploy to force you to get a Windows platform tablet in order for it to work properly.

Much faster than adobe when looking a blueprints (pdf's) via android phone or tablet, but is easily overloaded and can "potentially" crash often. Has a few bugs when highlighting pdf's and not Being able to view the highlights unless opening documents in another app. But it's still more efficient than Adobe when just viewing via tablet or phone.

Slow to open documents/pdfs..etc. Sometimes, I open a document, and the app doesn't open it. Instead, after a loading screen, it takes me to the recent docs tab, overall sluggish and slow. The experience isn't great, I expected better from microsoft. I hope you remove the annoying loading screen and take me directly to the file i opened without hitches.

This after this last update everything has gone to dump. This is complete failure at streamlining your app and just program in general. Files cannot be neatly organized and somehow the 'file' option leads you to some other stuff instead of letting you select the folder you want to save your files to. If it isn't broken don't fix it. In this case you guys broke it. Keep it simple. This issue need IMMEDIATE attention.

Samsung Note 20: it is a wonderful app. Reviewers say you can not move files to other folders. Yes, you can. Open the file, click the three dots, and choose Save As. Now you can choose the location you want to save the file to. A complaint is Outlook Calendar. Search displays data back six months only. To see data older than six months, I use Samsung Calendar. It uses the same data as Outlook does, yet displays data from years ago. On PC Outlook, Search performs as expected.

On the one hand it's convenient to have access to Word documents and Excel worksheets on the phone; on the other hand, the app is pretty limited in function, which is frustrating when you're used to the full functionality (e.g. if there's a way to apply (or even view) conditional formatting in Excel in the app, I haven't found it...). PLEASE get rid of the "try scanning" pop-up that interferes with opening documents.

If you'd like an app that allows you to use it in order to get your daily work done.. i'd recommend Adobe acrobat! Works way better than this hot garbage and let's you select more than one file at a time. You'd think with all that money that Microsoft could make a better PDF editing app. Guess not.

Before the beginning of 2024, I was able to save my files just fine. Now every time I try to save my files to Dropbox, it gives me a message that I can't edit the file unless it is saved. I've tried to save a copy and do "save as" over and over with no luck. Not sure what changed, but this is super frustrating as I use "Word" and "Excel" a lot for my college classes. I've tried to contact customer support and the email address doesn't work. I haven't found any other way to contact them either.

I Really like this app for several reasons, probably too many to list. However, I have to list one would be how soothing it is on the eyes. I know to many it may seem trivial but when a person of a particular age you find yourself shopping and looking for bigger and brighter things. This Microsoft app gives you both compared to its previous version

Very good app. Probably the best of it's kind and the email filter/focused inbox has become a feature I really will want on every mail app going forward. Additionally the ability to see redline on docs from my phone is fantastic. Only issue I'm currently having is that the app has suddenly started crashing pretty much every other use. This started 1.23.24 so I hope there's an update soon that fixes it. I may try to reinstall to see if it fixes it.

I'm getting more annoyed with this app and Microsoft in general. All of sudden, I can't edit a document on my phone? Since when? I have been using this app for the last couple of years and the only issue I had and STILL have was creating a file on my phone and it not showing when I try to find it on my laptop. I hate paying for services that become more complicated as you use them. Updating the app didn't seem to help at all.

There is absolutely no method to move a file to a folder, which makes Microsoft 365 useless and asinine. I never heard of such a thing in decades. Who creates an app or program that prevents the ability to move a file to a folder? Also, it insists I do not have Microsoft 365, but I had it for years. This is an unprecedented level of "we do not care about loyal customers."

I love the app. Has all the needed features. But there is a 'Try Scanning' card which appears on the front screen. It's taking screen real estate, and it loads slowly. Cause of this, when clicking on the most recent file, the click accidently happens on the card. Rest all is amazing, the devs have done a great job.

I am sure I will find the platform useful, especially because of its interface capabilities. just as soon as I beging figuring out how to use it. Examples of challenges are opening a file from email and viewing it either in Drive or other formats. Retrieving the documents, too, is a challenge. The problem is that I am unfamiliar with the comprehensive Microsoft platform . I wish there was a class at the college campus to teach us. I can start a learn Microsoft program through student services.

This application works really well as a lightweight Microsoft Office, and it easily syncs files with PC, but I'd really like to see an option to darken the page color when in night mode. There's a simple toggle for this on web and in the normal desktop application, so I'm wondering what the difficulty is in implementing it here? I will change this to 5 stars when that feature is added.

I'm so thankful to have this app, bc as a person who experiences waves of ideas for writing, instead of always reaching for Gmail or Messages, when I don't have access to a Notebook, I can open this app. and write. Save the Document, edit, add to, ect. and save it again for safe keeping. I can share it, print or just leave it in the App collection. I Love It!!

Love that I can use it across all my smart devices. ***Update: While it's great to view documents I've worked on or downloaded on a laptop, or print from my phone, editing and signing actions on my android phone do not save or translate to print, even though the Microsoft 365 app shows amendments and signatures. This renders it useless should I need to actually work on my phone.

Another disaster! The recents landing page takes several seconds to load due to a useless scanning image. You must wait for it to load before you can do anything!! This is the opposite of being productive! They use a minimal version of Word instead of the full 365 version of Word installed on my phone. The minimized version is missing crucial/essential settings/features. The app is visually pleasing but an utter failure in functionality like most Microsoft products. Uninstalling.

Having an issue with the voice recorder and transcriber. When i start recording, A pop-up states that it wasn't able to create a local copy and won't go away even after hitting "Okay". It is preventing me from actually recording anything. I hit "done" on a 20 second clip and it shows that it is 1 second and silent. App is the most up to date version and this occurred on 2 devices.

I have to remove a star. I use the scheduler, so I do not get automatic email notifications in the middle of the night? If you are going to include a function, make sure it works when you update. This function on Outlook worked in the past. The notification schedule is not consistent. It seems to work randomly, and I can not trust it. The sleep icon will be active, yet email alerts come through, or will not be on and block alerts. This is not what I have come to expect from Microsoft..

Surprised by how much I liked Office suite and cloud services after getting it set up. It's file access is noticably faster than all my other cloud servers. I Hardly know I'm using a cloud app, and incredibly, nearly fully functional Office apps no less, elegantly optimized for touch ui. Then the sophisticated collaboration capabilities are easy to set up. Very impressed. I wish there were some sort of MS-Access client that ran on Android.

Pretty useful app, I mostly just use it as a notepad, though something was changed about a month ago and now it sucks to use. The notes app is pretty helpful being close based. But it seems to be trying to open another window inside the app twice everytime I open and close a note on my phone. SUPER frustrating when I'm trying to find a specific note that has one line at the bottom I need.

Lowering my score. The amount of bloat and the neverending push to use Microsoft services is SO annoying. The latest issue that is causing this updated review is that a "Microsoft 355 Note" and other MS menu items are taking over the default context menu, forcing me to click through different options to find the "Copy" or "Paste" option. If remove this intrusive app then I get may normal menu back. Ugh

I genuinely like & appreciate this app so much! I recommend it to literally everyone when the topic of anything related comes up. It's many features are rly easy to use & navigate. I use this app exclusively any time I have to scan. sign, save, change photos to pdfs, editting docs... anything that I believe most people encounter having to do at some point today. There are some ads but they are few & are small on the home page not like other similar apps where every click had a full page 30sec ad

After the latest update, few essential tools has removed such as automatic capture 😕. Also after capturing, files were get automatically deleted. I don't know why that, but it happened few times. When share a captured file to external sources, it ask many options. So it gets harder to share files, I think the next update may better than now, If not I might be use any other app. Thank You.

Fails on all active links to YouTube. The reason is obscure. It might be because the system is wrongly failing to find a permissions profile found only on a work account, when mine is a personal account. Of course, this is a major defect, because of the importance of YouTube. There are third party docx apps without this problem. The major thing that is lost is docx as a problem-free, dependable transfer format. This is an annoying over-complexity: the simple behaviour would just work.

Microsoft 365 is an absolute lifesaver! The range of applications from Word to Excel, coupled with the cloud storage on OneDrive and Intregation of Microsoft copilot has revolutionized how I work. The seamless integration between all the tools, regular updates, and the ability to access my work from anywhere make it an indispensable part of my daily routine. Kudos to the team behind this fantastic suite of apps.

I use this app for personal use more than anything. I love having the ability to type out the short story I'm thinking about. So convenient. I love the variety of fonts available and the different types of pages. My only nitpicky complaint (it's not even worth taking a star away for me): when you first load a document, whether it's a new one or an older file, and you go to select your font it glitches back to the very beginning after 3-5 seconds. Regardless, I still love the app.

I usually read PDF with this app, but it is horrendous. The scroll bar is too sensitive. Just merely touching the side, and it jumps you into another page, and you lost track of where you were reading. The word search function is broken. It does not work anymore. Even if it works, the scroll bar is annoying. Why have it still accessible up there at the same spot as the next search button. Other programs are okay, but I would not recommend Excel, at least on the phone.

I'm surprised that the well-known company with its most famous software (Word) in the world, doesn't have considered "right-to-left" text formatting and also custom fonts feature for this app, which have been available on the Windows OS, for years! Many users, including myself, have encountered issues where Persian text within documents is displayed incorrectly. Thank you for your attention to this matter.

I've been using this app for a while and it's been brilliant for generating and sending invoices whilst on the go. All of a sudden it has changed and although I can edit my spreadsheets, the only option it gives me to share an invoice is by sending the whole workbook and no longer gives me the option to send individually as pdf. I can send the whole document as a pdf, but don't want to send all 17 invoices, just the most recent one. Why change something that was so simple and quick before?

I have been having an issue with the last update. When closing a document, it automatically saves the changes without asking. There's no option to discard the changes, specially when a document is opened for viewing only and a change is made accidentally. I have this problem with Excel, I haven't tested other apps. This is a big problem for a very good app! Also, PLEASE BRING NOTES BACK IN EXCEL. **MICROSOFT PLEASE FIX** then I'll change to 5 star ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

keeps hanging and closes suddenly while using the app. When multi-tasking, the app almost immediately crashes, and none of the changes are saved. I like the idea of an all in one app but for now the standalone excel, word, ppt, adobe acrobat works better. Hope they can fix the bug soon. Update 5 Jan 2024: Some bug fixes were made and I see a noticeable difference in stability. Works better on offline files but still facing bugs if your editing files on cloud (oneDrive).
data.replyText: Apologies for the app stability issues you have faced. Our team is actively working on fixing these bugs. Please update to the latest version of the app which has several bug fixes. Thank you for your feedback and patience. If you have any further concerns, please let us know.

data.text: Works well on its own and for the go, but not well synced with Apple products, in terms of editing access across multiple devices, file management (e.g. duplication of files with offline accessibility). And when online, file syncing on Windows desktop is not as seamless as it could be, resulting in file saving issues. Some improvements in this regard, but can still be disruptive.

I've not found it suits me, mainly because I use it to open documents and basically tells me it's unable to open a simple email attachment such as payslips, letters from employers etc. just simple stuff so pretty much a waste of a download and subscription. Hope you all have more success than myself... oh and I have a Galaxy S24 which is what I use it on. prior to internet upgrades it seemed to work but now... not.

The recent update has ruined the app. I am unable to edit my word, Excel and PowerPoint files which was the whole purpose 9f this app. The previous version also supported Lists and Loop files. But now I am unable to find them and Microsoft has decided to instead replace them with Copilot which is useless as it is not integrated with your work space and can't answer questions related to your files. It is a dumb update which has significantly reduced the functionality of the app.
data.replyText: Thank you for your feedback. We are constantly working to improve the app. For the word edit issues, can you please try logging out and logging back in from the profile tab? Please click on the in-app display image on the top left to go to the Me profile tab. Please let us know if this works for you.

data.text: All-in-one convenience, good basic functionality, offline access and cloud integration with 1TB OneDrive. Overall, Microsoft 365 Android app is a handy tool for basic document viewing, creation, and editing on the go. However, limited functionality and a subscription requirement might hold back power users. Consider your needs and usage patterns before subscribing.

My only problem with this as an Android application is that I have to go so deep, well, you know two or three steps, to find the notes app. And when I do get to the menu and close the note, I don't know maybe you can see what's happI do not mean the OneNote app. Anyways, I use this the most. It enables me to speak into my phone and it uploads to my computer in real time. I love it. It should be featured more predominantly or at least have the option to have a shortcut for it on the phone screen.

I love the app. It allows for quick reviewing any file type of Office, connection to Drive, Sharepoint and edit files. Even has excel function without having excell installed locally. Minuses are the notification are delayed by a day about opening file in O365 but they are useless anyway. It's spam. Second thing, sometime it takes hour to load the app without success on 'preparing account/loading account information' - the very first loading screen.

I love this app, keeps all my Microsoft apps in one place, the only thing I have a problem with, is on a very rare occasion that one of my documents finds corruption, it asks if I want to recover then tells me to access from a PC or IOS, why can't I recover a corrupted document on android. 17/03/24 - Don't like the new update as I don't always have access to my OneDrive due to limited internet but new update won't let me edit from my tablet's storage box.

the all in one app has been too handy, the fact that it uses up less space as compared to download all the other apps for use is just too enticing and it's advanced features help to work on your mobile phones just as you would on a laptop. it really is a very helpful app.

Excel sucks. You can hardly do a single task without bouncing through 5 or 6 buttons and options. Even type type, enter, type, enter, as a method of filling cells is not possible. You need to select every individual cell, then select typing, then type, then enter, then select next cell. Every single small task I a big chore. Word, pdf, etc are as bad. Has the "search term" ever worked? You search a term, shows 40 results, but after navigating to 2nd or 3rd result, it stops working. Junk

I moved to a new device and tried to scan directly, and the results aren't as good as before. The paper size can't even be adjusted, and it's useless using the crop feature because the result after shot with camera, it's cropped by itself and can't even move the grid to adjust the whole document. Fix it!!! It's annoying!!!

The app is quite good and handy on my tablet, but over the last few months, at times, whilst typing on Word, the app just crashes, seconds before this happens no type appears whilst typing and only the cursor moving along, the last sentence or few words typed prior to the crash is lost, even after the recent update, the crash still occurs at times but not everytime, not sure if it is because of too much information too quick or just a momentary glitch, there was a time where this did not happen.

recently update make me getting slow . why i need using one drive share to other ? why no offline default function ? also auto save are too much . its should wait until i close the file only auto save , not always overwrite my file with this function . no wonder when i start click save as , the file has been autosave , this is phone/tab , plenty of battery life , shouldn't autosave during editing & overwirte previous file

Latest version seems stable after a while of using and updates. Previously: Doesn't even attempt to open since the change from office to 365, one star, after 30 minutes uninstalling and re installing ect 3 stara, see how it goes not a good start for years of using Office.

The app has been exceptionally good. However, for the past few weeks, it automatically deletes files, and although you're able to see the file listed among the recent files, you're unable to open. It gives feedback that the files may have been deleted or moved. I've lost two Excel documents in just 2 weeks.

I thought there would be 100% compatibility between the Microsoft office PC version and the mobile version, seems like I was wrong. Is this app only compatible with the office online? Also, this app can't export Docx files to pdfs accurately. The only thing it does correctly is sync files but alas, I do not use onedrive. In a nutshell, this app is good, but needs improvement, a lot of improvements.
Ever since I updated this app, it's been more glitchy. I can't save PDFs to a specified location, and PDFs seem to be corrupted when they do get saved. I wish I hadn't updated.

Sick of Microsoft. They want you to sign in everywhere, then they push you to buy their offers of the very "cheap" products like 99£/€/$ yearly subscription for standard Office... when you buy a licensed Windows laptop/computer, you are already paying lot of money to Bill Gate's company. On top of that, as other companies, they also make business with your data. I paid for a key on Microsoft Office and is already Odessey to download, not talking about to install. Im moving to FREE Google Docs.

Feeling cheated.. bought the basic plan for one drive as it showed that mobile version of MS word, excel are included... after payment it was told that mobile version plays only on tablets with screen size less than 10.9 inch... mybtablet is 11 inch... so I will not get that membership.

Office 365 allows every single device you use to be like a portable office. I literally use my Android for sermon creation and all kinds of word processing. and then of course I can also pick it up on my laptop. I wouldn't be without it.

I mean, what nonsense... app is preinstalled on my Samsung galaxy device, and it is showing adds on it... why the hell do you have to collab with samsung. Its upto a person if they want to take premium version or not.. if its normal app I could understand adds on it but on the preinstalled app you showing adds. Pathetic

How to Uninstaller the newer version is the most terrible thing they every thought of the old version is God send versus the newer one it's won't even.let you share the your file in email. I was use this app for business now I can't even sent my rate confirmation or invoices to anyone this app should be lifting in outta space and blow to a billion pieces who ever thought of this should be fire. They make a good thing a bad thing

Constantly forces you to use other Microsoft facilities & products (one drive, edge, etc) and recently caused issues with Dropbox. Please stop doing it or you'll drive me to cancel my subscription and use docs instead.

Whose the dumb Cænt... That changed the interface to something this stupid? The previous layout made it easy to access the recent files... Now... Now its just a clutter for advertisement and shoving of the "copilot" gimmick.... Honestly if I could I'd bootleg an old windows XP and rum my PCs and devices on them.

Waste of money. Microsoft used to be easy to handle, but now it's just more complocated way more frustrating than it needs to be. I liked it better when it was more simple & easy to navigate. Now it auto saves I can't even find my files to pull things up & to edit I can't even work on stuff I previously did because I don't even know what I'm doing anymore. That's auto save is real pain because It constantly saves more documents & doesn't even give them proper names. All same name.

The app was great. But after the recent update the search bar is not showing any keyboards. ie, when you are trying to search some keywords in a pdf document, the search bar doesn't show the keyboard which makes it impossible to enter any input to search. Kindly fix

Just discovered right now that they have limited the features that can used in free plan e.g., I can no longer divide a page into a column of any number, and I must say I am extremely disappointed. I know this is to increase the number of subscriptions but amongst any document applications, it is only this MS Word and other applications that I find helpful and best caters my needs for making any document and finding out this change really disappointed me.

After purchasing Microsoft 365, my printer no longer accepts printing from my android phone & will not allow me to add my printer as a device on Microsoft Defender! Unable to add my phone as a device! **I now have Microsoft 365 Basic and I continue to get ads on Outlook. Each day I am asked to buy Microsoft 365. I have chatted with Support several times with zero results!

This app used to be the Office app. I have it installed to access my Sticky Notes, Word Docs, Spreadsheets, and Slideshows, to edit them or create new ones. Now you've added Copilot, and OneDrive. The landing page is now OneDrive!! My documents and shared documents and tools are now hidden away in submenus. THIS IS THE WORST UPDATE I'VE EVER SEEN, GO BACK TO OFFICE. This app is not OneDrive- I have an App for OneDrive which is secured. Make this app about what it was installed for, OFFICE!!

Office installed Copilot, which knocked out my Outlook calendar. I can't seem to get rid of Copilot and I can't reinstall Outlook. Since I rarely use the other Office apps in my phone, I might as well get rid of all of it. I don't use Google Assistant so Copilot as a replacement is no use to me and it uninstalled the one Office app I was using frequently.
This is perfect! For your AI, make it replace objects with a picture. For example, if someone wants to put a dress on with their face on a picture, make the AI do that.

This app has worked perfectly fine for the past four years. However, someone decided that the current layout wasn't good enough and changed everything. The button locations changed, and the saving locations of files have been made more convoluted and unintuitive.

Was really good, I used it every day for various tasks BUT now they've (Microsoft) have forced yet another "app" on people - Copilot!! Can't get rid of it, dont want it, didn't ask for it and can't uninstall it!! Plus, after reading reports on Copilot, we're likely going to have to pay for it too!! Already pay for Microsoft 365, Not happy at all!! I want MS 365 without Copilot, thank you very much.

First of all, I am paying for Office365. Update: PDF Reader is stuttering during scrolling on every phone I used this app. Docx scrolling is unbelievably bad (like elastic bands and no inertia). Like, are we back in 2006? Old: Also it shows that hideous office advertisement every time I open a file. 🤯 Converting a PDF to Word throws an error, so a couple of files are now unusable (as the file itself wasn't made searchable during scanning like Adobe does).
Too many suggestions, pop up, and ads. It's hard to navigate when have the screen it taken up by ads for the product you are using and pop ups and stop you mid production.

many times, when select to save the worked file it doesn't gets saved and didn't even comes in Recent this Problem I am having since last mounth after update before that it was ok and didn't came such problem If possible please fix it as soon as possible I've already lost my 2 of almost done files

After Microsoft discontinued expanded email storage for $1/month, and demanded $70/year for it (only way was 365 Personal), which I wouldn't pay, I migrated to Google, who charged $12 to $24/year for expanded storage--and allowed multiple associated accounts. Two years later, Microsoft has matched with 365 Basic for $20/year. I now receive my Hotmail, again, but what I was sent while it was locked was not stored, only the thirty years of email that preceded their policy change demanding $70/year

Unfortunately anything other than a simple text edit on this app for Excel and Word is too frustrating. I always end up finding a real computer. I'm Word the attempt at convenience by auto focusing on an item and showing a context menu makes it near impossible to make high level layout changes or inserts.

I really love how I can use any part of Microsoft Office on my phone, whether it is for personal use or school, and send right away minimizing down time. Whoever thought of this idea deserves a raise. I prefer Microsoft Office over any other substitute on the market. Thank you so much!

I use Google keyboard on my documents and whenever I'm typing, I choose one of the suggested words that pops up, it never puts it in. It doesn't replace the word or space after the word so I end up with weird things like "this fixingword proceduredoesn’t work" and I have to manually delete every time and go back and enter the words I actually mean. It's incredibley frustrating that a word processor doesn't do the one thing it's supposed to.

Edit: Why is front page "Onedrive"? Files from phone are on there aswell and what is copilot? If Ihad known it came with the update I wouldn't have downloaded it. If I want to use AI then I will use a seperate program. I don't like that it could possibly analyze the contents of my files and send them somewhere :(....App started to require signing in when trying to open files :(

What a painfull experience dealing with this awful service. It is so difficult to set up, it took me all day and night to try to get it configured and it still didn't work right. Still got ads even with a premium account and there is no help anywhere. This is just pure garbage. Subscription canceled and apps deleted in less than 24hrs.

The app is very good. It's my go to app for reading any documents or editing on my phone. Settings and displays are simple which is a plus point. But DEV can you please remove the screenshot icon on the screen while reading PDF files. It gets in the way and disturbs our flow of reading. Looking forward to your kind response and action.
works great for writing and saving documents. I was able to create and edit my resume and it came out great. I was skeptical at first but the UI is great. I highly recommend

Was good, now awful. I mainly use notes. Something changed a few weeks ago and notes (sticky notes I think but just called notes on Android) can now no longer be searched. I have to go through over a thousand notes by hand every time. They used to be searched along with other Office apps in one go but are now excluded, now having a separate 'notes' app that does not support search. The PC stick notes app or Outlook access seem to work. But not Android. Why can't they just leave stuff alone?

Not liking the new version of the app. Putting a shorter list of last files means often having to click to expand and scroll, now can't go direct to file types to see my notes, PowerPoints easily and search doesn't find what I need. Seems to freeze on loading more often now as well. I'm all for improvements but I feel this is a negative change. Please put it back to how it was.

it is useful for quick edits but the android apps are no where near the functionality of desktop apps...please increase the functionality and please keep the functions in the same places as in desktop app. for example page break is not in the same place...I have office 365 subscription but the android app feels like a free version of a paid app

Trying to edit a document in Word is the worst. I have some data in another Word doc, and I can't open 2 files at once. Ok, that's not that big of a deal, I took a screenshot and tried to switch between Word and the picture. It keeps freaking out every time I come back to Word. Why can't it just keep the cursor there and give me the keyboard so I can go right back at it? Also it does not place the cursor where I want the first 3 times I press. Looks like I will have to carry my laptop around

I acquired it through my work place as I'm an elementary school teacher. I use it on both my work devices and my personal devices and everything is so streamlined and efficient. I would recommend this software to everyone.

very useful app, as it helps me in various works. it helps me in study, it keep and arranges my documents, ppts and Excel sheets. it's very useful app. but one thing i don't like about it, is that- this app closes automatically when I use it for long time like 1 or 2 hour. Microsoft must solve this issue. thanks!

This app used to work great. But now it won't even open anything. It just flashes a black and white screen with the Microsoft 365 Logo on it. I've continuously tried multiple different documents saved in different formats, and none of them will open. It's the same result with everything.

Please don't Install this application. It's a total loss of money. Always show icon for install office 365. After subscribing this application they always tell it's a software counterfeit application and install genuine office 365. Can't type malayalam. Google Docs and google sheet is best for normal people. Waste Application.I subscribed so many times but always makes problem .When suscribe from Google Play Store it doesn't support Laptop. I am totally disappointed with this application

I have a work account and a personal account. Right now, I cannot access my personal account. Because it clashes with my work account. How do I get this fixed? Looking at the issues of others. They haven't gotten a response. I probably won't either. this app crashes or doesn't work at all along with other Microsoft apps, like word. just use the main apps at work or on your laptop. this thing is also heavy to load (takes a while). it isn't worth using.

It's a come in handy app because the experience of the office in the PC is way better, but it helps when you don't have a PC (at least available out of the home place for example), and I use word (app) mainly. The main issues I have with the office mobile: difficulty to select text for example, for editing, even though with a big screen (I don't have sure if it's more an Android issue); the options list in the landscape mode could be sideways, not below the document view, would be more practical

Clipboard is greyed out on Samsung keyboard, but works on other keyboards like swiftkey and gboard. This is a known issue reported on forums, Microsoft community and reddit. It's greyed out across the entire office 365 apps, including excel, word, onenote etc. It's quite annoying bc copy/paste plays a large role in using these apps. Not sure why they have disabled the clipboard on the Samsung keyboard. This has been going on for over 5 years. Please just fix and or enable.

I love Microsoft applications for a Windows operating laptop or PC and do think it's necessary to be able to access some of those files or created documents with a smartphone that uses an Android OS but these Microsoft applications seem to have a hiccup so where within the mobile applications that are making them less efficient and are steering away from what Microsoft is used for. Gets confusing to toggle back and forth without the proper communication between the applications.

I paid for this program, for some reason after logging into one drive it changed the whole format of the app. This format is so much. I have all kinds of problems that are only six by closing the app and reopening it. Right now I'm having a problem with copy and pasting from the internet into a word document

I have to say at first I was thinking just another app for money but this is something you need these days! You feel safer and know they have you back and you never know if you ever lose a phone or device but you won't lose anything! Plus all the new features are amazing and when I put it on my laptop it will even be better! So I know lots of people don't like to read reviews but sometimes you have to and see if the app is for you or not for you!

My experience is that if you have more than one account it will mix up which apps go to which apps and spread your private data to non-private accounts and then if you need help you got to call in and they want to charge you $100 to fix it they were no help it's mixed up all my data and I have spent days trying to fix the problem with no regard to how their account got the entangled I would not recommend anybody to use this unless you want your data breached one way or another help center no hel

By itself office model is utterly useless. It doesn't have the ability to reopen a word file if you create one in it. If you close the word file and go back in to that docx file you just created edit is grayed out and this is on all files. To Open the same file you have to open the one drive app, Open the file and then click the office app icon. Which will then open the file in office mobile which is the app you used to create it in the 1st place. This is level 1 IQ thinking here.

I downloaded the app, and since then I have not been able to log in. It usually stops after inputting email verification. Then says 'my device or browser may not be compatible' I have downloaded several browsers to atleast sign in on them. Nothing.

Love the fact that Microsoft has started to offer, for quite some time now, a monthly subscription to our must-have applications or programs such as Word, Excel, and PowerPoint! For us, poor artists, it's the only way we can partake. 5 stars, hands down! A+++++

I just downloaded this app for the first time, although I've been using Microsoft Word (and I have an account already). I decided to upgrade to the office app, but since I downloaded it, I haven't had any access to the app. It just shows, "checking for accounts". It's really frustrating. What am I doing wrong?

Why does Microsoft think it's ok to take over all your files and settings just because you want to use 1 part of an app? I only wanted to use Word mobile but now it's auto syncing with OneDrive and wants to pdf files by default. Uninstalling and tempted to cancel my 365 subscription.

With Microsoft 365 (office), my every day task starting from business through school activities are much easier to manage and navigate. My work is pretty much organized and sturdy with the Microsoft office app. Thank you!

Word app has always been my go-to app for writing but for the past two months,it has been acting up. I am unable to write,edit or open old documents and new ones despite updating the app severally. Please do something about this Microsoft
data.replyText:
Thank you for sending Microsoft feedback. Your input is valuable to us and helps improve our products.

Can you please try to logout and login again from the Me profile tab? Please let us know if this works for you.

data.text: Microsoft 365 is too complicated to use. It asks you to sign into often. Converting PDFs to word produces rubbish words overwritten and whole lines overwritten. Worst of all, I cannot edit documents in word and save them to my computer. This program is so awful that I don't want to waste my time talking about it there are a lot of other things that are wrong with it that I Don't have time to mention. Microsoft 365 is a complete mess.

The app is good before the update. After updating, it starts crashing. I restarted my device,checked internet, did every bit of thing but the problem is not fixed. Atlast I uninstalled and reinstalled it again, the problem is not fixed and a new problem arises, i.e. the pdf file starts lagging. Please fix this ASAP. Except all those mentioned things, everything is working fine. And chatgpt 4 is amazing(Although it need some improvements from the feedbacks)
